description.content: Anzen is a Micro SaaS product that provides cryptographic protection for sensitive digital images. The application uses advanced encryption techniques to ensure that personal and confidential images remain secure and accessible only to authorized users.
The solution is particularly valuable for protecting sensitive digital memories, such as:

The application is built on a modern tech stack, including Next.js for the frontend and API routes, Tailwind CSS for styling, and MongoDB for data storage. The encryption processes are handled securely, with keys managed through a robust system that ensures only authorized users can decrypt and access the protected images.

This project demonstrates my ability to develop secure applications that handle sensitive data, as well as my understanding of encryption principles and their practical implementation in web applications.
